description: Products describe the specific goods or services you offer to your customers. You can use them in your invoices and checkout links.

code.description: The product’s SKU (Stock Keeping Unit) describe specific product variations, taking into account any combination of: attributes, currency, and cost.

created_at.description: Time at which the object was created. Measured in seconds since the Unix epoch.

currency.description: Three-letter [ISO currency code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217), in uppercase. Must be a supported currency in your payment processors.

description.description: The product’s description, meant to be displayable to the customer. Use this field to optionally store a long form explanation of the product being sold for your own rendering purposes.

paypal_interval_duration.description: Only for `subscriptions`. Number of times the charge should recur.

paypal_interval_frequency.description: Only for PayPal `subscriptions`. The number of intervals between subscription billings.

paypal_interval_unit.description: Only for PayPal `subscriptions`. Specifies billing frequency.

kind.description: The type of transaction: one-off purchase or subscription.

name.description: The product’s name, meant to be displayable to the customer.

product_type.description: The type of the product. The product is either a tangible `good` or a `service`.

stripe_plan_id.description: Only for Stripe `subscriptions`. ID of the Stripe price related to the subscription.

tax_based_on.description: How taxes are going to be calculated: based on the customer country or a particular country.

tax_class.description: The tax class that applies to the product.

tax_type.description: Specify if taxes are included or excluded in the `unit_cost`.

unit_cost.description: The unit amount to be charged

stock.description: The stock of the physical product.
